lyric:
[00:00.000] 作曲 : Tracy Chapman
[00:01.000] 作词 : Tracy Chapman
[00:18.65]You've got a fast car
[00:20.68]I want a ticket to anywhere
[00:22.84]Maybe we can make a deal
[00:24.85]Maybe together we can get somewhere
[00:27.06]Any place is better
[00:29.33]Starting from zero got nothing to lose
[00:31.28]Maybe we'll make something
[00:33.37]Me myself, I got nothing to prove
[00:35.55]You got a fast car
[00:37.65]I got a plan to get us out of here
[00:39.52]I've been working at the convenience store
[00:41.84]Managed to save just a little bit of money
[00:43.86]Won't have to drive too far
[00:45.99]Just across the border and into the city
[00:48.14]You and I can both get jobs
[00:50.27]And finally see what it means to be living
[00:52.35]You've got a fast car
[00:54.42]Is it fast enough so we can fly away?
[00:56.57]You gotta make a decision
[00:58.68]Leave tonight or live and die this way
[01:01.03]
[01:16.33]So remember when we were driving
[01:18.44]Driving in your car
[01:19.64]The speed so fast I felt like I was drunk
[01:21.85]City lights lay out before us
[01:23.89]And your arms felt nice wrapped around my shoulders
[01:25.90]And I had
[01:28.04]Had a feeling that I belonged
[01:30.24]And I had
[01:32.12]Had a feeling that I could be someone
[01:40.47]Had a feeling that I could be someone
[01:46.92]
[01:51.01]See my old man's got a problem
[01:53.27]He lives with the bottle that's the way it is
[01:55.45]Says his body's too old for working
[01:57.67]His body's too young to look like his
[01:59.73]My mama went off and left him
[02:01.90]She wanted more from life than he could give
[02:03.73]I said somebody's got to take care of him
[02:05.91]So I quit school, that's what I did
[02:08.05]You got a fast car
[02:10.17]We go cruising, entertain ourselves
[02:12.45]You still ain't got a job
[02:14.37]And I work in a market as a checkout girl
[02:16.39]I know things will get better
[02:18.68]You'll find work and I'll get promoted
[02:20.84]We'll move out of the shelter
[02:22.93]Buy a bigger house and live in the suburbs
[02:24.99]You've got a fast car
[02:26.97]Is it fast enough so we can fly away?
[02:29.18]You gotta a decision
[02:31.32]Leave tonight or live and die this way
[02:35.50]
[02:48.94]So remember when we were driving
[02:50.97]Driving in your car
[02:52.31]The speed so fast I felt like I was drunk
[02:54.69]City lights lay out before us
[02:56.61]And your arms felt nice wrapped around my shoulders
[02:58.55]And I had
[03:00.66]Had a feeling that I belonged
[03:02.89]And I had
[03:04.72]Had a feeling that I could be someone
[03:13.16]Had a feeling that I could be someone, be someone
[03:21.55]Had a feeling that I could be someone
tlyric:
[by:NeedForSpeed-DK]
[00:18.65]你有辆快车
[00:20.68]我想乘着去任何地方
[00:22.84]说不定我们能做笔交易
[00:24.85]一起跋山涉水
[00:27.06]无论风景如何
[00:29.33]心无旁骛而不惧得失
[00:31.28]或许我们可以做一些事
[00:33.37]抛弃纷扰，不再需要那些证明
[00:35.55]你有辆快车
[00:37.65]我计划着一起逃离喧嚣
[00:39.52]我曾在便利店工作
[00:41.84]设法攒下了一点点钱
[00:43.86]不需要远行
[00:45.99]只需越过边境抵达理想城市
[00:48.14]一个你我都能找到工作
[00:50.27]终究知悉生活真谛的地方
[00:52.35]你有辆快车
[00:54.42]能否带我们疾驰逃离这一切
[00:56.57]你必须做出决定
[00:58.68]要么今晚启程远行，要么在此终其一生虚度光阴
[01:16.33]还记得我们开车的时候
[01:18.44]在你的车里
[01:19.64]我沉醉于飞驰的速度
[01:21.85]城市光影在我们身后追逐逝去
[01:23.89]你把我拥入怀中，一切如此美好
[01:25.90]于是我深信
[01:28.04]我找到了归属
[01:30.24]深信着
[01:32.12]我过上了全新的人生
[01:40.47]我过上了全新的人生
[01:51.01]我的父亲深陷困境
[01:53.27]他终日酗酒解愁
[01:55.45]感叹自己老了
[01:57.67]我深知他仍老当益壮
[01:59.73]我的妈妈转身离去
[02:01.90]渴求那些他无法给予的人生
[02:03.73]我说总得有人去照顾他
[02:05.91]所以我放弃学业照顾起他的起居
[02:08.05]你有辆快车
[02:10.17]我们出去兜风，尽情玩乐
[02:12.45]你还是没找到工作
[02:14.37]而我在超市里当起收银员
[02:16.39]我们笃信生活会更好
[02:18.68]你会找到工作而我会升职
[02:20.84]我们会搬离现在住的地方
[02:22.93]买一个更大的郊区住房
[02:24.99]你有辆快车
[02:26.97]能否带我们疾驰逃离这一切
[02:29.18]你必须做出决定
[02:31.32]要么今晚启程远行，要么在此终其一生虚度光阴
[02:48.94]还记得我们开车的时候
[02:50.97]在你的车里
[02:52.31]我沉醉于飞驰的速度
[02:54.69]城市光影在我们身后追逐逝去
[02:56.61]你把我拥入怀中，一切如此美好
[02:58.55]于是我深信
[03:00.66]我找到了归属
[03:02.89]深信着
[03:04.72]我过上了全新的人生
[03:13.16]我过上了全新的人生，全新的人生
[03:21.55]我过上了全新的人生
